alert.note: Alert for Beadle; Brule; Jerauld; Kingsbury (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 14 at 8:42PM MST until December 16 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM WEDNESDAY TO 3 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 50 to 65 mph, which will likely cause visibility to fall to around a half mile or less at times in blowing snow. The strongest winds will be during the evening. * WHERE...Beadle, Jerauld, Kingsbury and Brule Counties. * WHEN...From 4 PM Wednesday to 3 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A rapid drop in temperatures may cause roads to quickly freeze during the evening and overnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
